Uses of Class
org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.DiffFilter.Builder

Packages that use DiffFilter.Builder
Package
Description
org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff
 

  • Uses of DiffFilter.Builder in org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff

    Methods in org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff that return DiffFilter.Builder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DiffFilter.Builder
    DiffFilter.Builder.allowAllChangeTypes()
    Resets the list of allowed change types to allow all change types.
    DiffFilter.Builder
    DiffFilter.Builder.allowAllFileExtensions()
    Resets the list of allowed file extensions to allow all file extensions.
    DiffFilter.Builder
    DiffFilter.Builder.allowedChangeTypes​(org.eclipse.jgit.diff.DiffEntry.ChangeType... changeTypes)
    Only allow the given change types for patches.
    DiffFilter.Builder
    DiffFilter.Builder.allowedFileExtensions​(String... fileExtensions)
    Same as allowedPaths but with file extensions instead of regexes.
    DiffFilter.Builder
    DiffFilter.Builder.allowedPaths​(String regex)
    Adds a regex of allowed file paths for patches.
    DiffFilter.Builder
    DiffFilter.Builder.allowMerge​(boolean allowMerge)
    Specifies whether merge commits should be considered or not.
    DiffFilter.Builder
    DiffFilter.Builder.blockedFileExtensions​(String... fileExtensions)
    Same as allowedPaths but with file extensions instead of regexes.
    DiffFilter.Builder
    DiffFilter.Builder.blockedPaths​(String regex)
    Adds a regex of blocked file paths for patches.
